name: ping (itch) (gauze)
description:
arrows to move, space to fire, a/d to rotate (sorry). r to reset if dead

made in one sitting to see what would happen. timelapse: https://twitter.com/__gauze/status/1220684119644033024

the bg music is Drive by someone called Alex. i don't know who they are but it's beautiful: http://ccmixter.org/files/AlexBeroza/43098
